product_name: The North Face Apex Android Hooded Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A totally windproof soft shell, the men's Apex Android Hooded Jacket from The North Face does wonders for keeping you out longer on blustery climbs, hikes and other adventures. Windproof Apex ClimateBlock fabric stretches, breathes and has a soft brushed backing for next-to-skin comfort. Durable water repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Adjustable hood adds significant warmth and weather protection. Full-length windflap with chin guard, adjustable cuffs and hem drawcord seal in warmth. Zippered hand pockets and bicep pocket. The North Face Android Hooded Jacket for men features a standard fit; it's the hooded version of The North Face Apex Bionic Jacket. Closeout.
short_description: A totally windproof soft shell, the men's Apex Android Hooded Jacket from The North Face does wonders for keeping you out longer on blustery climbs, hikes and other adventures.
